document_data.title: Scrutiny on the Bounty
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Scrutiny on the Bounty''''' is a one round adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program. It was published in May 1998 and is intended for adventurers of any level.

{{quote|''A request for assistance leads to a voyage working for an unlikely taskmaster. Solving a mystery is one thing, but matters get complicated when your commitment, valor, and sense of justice are sorely tested.''}}
document_data.Synopsis: On 28{{th}} of [[Flamerule]], the {{YearlinkName|1378}}, Mayor [[Amber Lynn Thoden]] ordered a group of adventurers of [[Ravens Bluff]] to act as escort for the High Autharch [[Blaze Mythalanir]], accompanying him and a legendary ship – ''[[Bounty (ship)|Bounty]]'', across the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] to [[Bezantur]]. It was imperative adventurers did not interfere with the Thayan officials nor his slaves to avoid political repercussions. The adventurers sailed off, but unbeknownst to everyone onboard, the legendary ship held a ''[[pocket dimension]]'' that became home to a coven of [[bheur hag]]s while the ship was lost at sea. The [[hag]]s began killing the ship's crew one at a time, causing fear and mistrust. Subsequently, the hags attacked Blaze Mythalanir himself, forcing him to ''[[teleport]]'', abandoning the ''Bounty''. Eventually, the hags were slain, and the heroes of the Living City were left with the ship and its slave crew. The ''Bounty'' was returned to its rightful owner – the nation of [[Aglarond]]. The slaves were granted freedom.
